abstract: Grolier Club exhibition Aldus Manutius: A Legacy More Lasting Than Bronze celebrates 500th anniversary of death of 16th-century Venetian printing pioneer.
lead_paragraph: The exhibition, “Aldus Manutius: A Legacy More Lasting Than Bronze,” includes nearly 150 Aldines, or books from the press that Aldus founded in Venice in 1494.

headline.main: A Tribute to the Printer Aldus Manutius, and the Roots of the Paperback
headline.print_headline: The Earliest Roots of the Paperback

snippet: The exhibition, “Aldus Manutius: A Legacy More Lasting Than Bronze,” includes nearly 150 Aldines, or books from the press that Aldus founded in Venice in 1494.
